member.name: M:Pubquiz.WebApi.Controllers.GameController.SetReview(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Set the game to the review state and navigate to the first quizitem of the specified section.

member.name: M:Pubquiz.WebApi.Controllers.QuizController.UploadZippedExcelQuiz(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.IFormFile)
member.summary: Upload a zip file containing an excel file and associated media files.

member.name: T:Pubquiz.WebApi.Hubs.GameHub
member.summary: The GameHub is responsible for communicating relevant changes in a game. To be able to manage the connection properly without the risk of sending messages to the wrong clients, we create groups. - a group for the quiz master - a group for the teams To isolate group names within a game, the id of the game is used as postfix. So there will be a group called quizmaster-[gameId] and a group for the teams called teams-[gameId]. Whenever a connection is lost, group membership MUST be rebuild.

member.name: M:Pubquiz.WebApi.Hubs.IGameHub.TeamRegistered(Pubquiz.Logic.Messages.TeamRegistered)
member.summary: Called when a team registered for a game. Notifies other teams.

member.name: M:Pubquiz.WebApi.Hubs.IGameHub.QmTeamRegistered(Pubquiz.Logic.Messages.QmTeamRegistered)
member.summary: Called when a team registered for a game. Notifies the quiz masters within the current game.

member.name: M:Pubquiz.WebApi.Hubs.IGameHub.TeamConnectionChanged(Pubquiz.Logic.Messages.TeamConnectionChanged)
member.summary: Called when a team connects with signalr.

member.name: M:Pubquiz.WebApi.Hubs.IGameHub.TeamLoggedOut(Pubquiz.Logic.Messages.TeamLoggedOut)
member.summary: Called when a team logs out (leaves the game). Notifies other teams and the qui master within the current game.

member.name: M:Pubquiz.WebApi.Hubs.IGameHub.UserLoggedOut(Pubquiz.Logic.Messages.UserLoggedOut)
member.summary: Called when a user logs out (leaves the game). Notifies other teams and the quiz master within the current game.

member.name: M:Pubquiz.WebApi.Hubs.IGameHub.TeamNameUpdated(Pubquiz.Logic.Messages.TeamNameUpdated)
member.summary: Called when a team updates its name.

member.name: M:Pubquiz.WebApi.Hubs.IGameHub.TeamDeleted(Pubquiz.Logic.Messages.TeamDeleted)
member.summary: Called when a team is deleted.

member.name: M:Pubquiz.WebApi.Hubs.IGameHub.TeamMembersChanged(Pubquiz.Logic.Messages.TeamMembersChanged)
member.summary: Called when a team changes its team members.

member.name: M:Pubquiz.WebApi.Hubs.IGameHub.GameStateChanged(Pubquiz.Logic.Messages.GameStateChanged)
member.summary: Called when the quiz master changes the state of the game.

member.name: M:Pubquiz.WebApi.Hubs.IGameHub.ItemNavigated(Pubquiz.Logic.Messages.ItemNavigated)
member.summary: Called when the quiz master navigates to another quiz item.

member.name: M:Pubquiz.WebApi.Hubs.IGameHub.InteractionResponseAdded(Pubquiz.Logic.Messages.InteractionResponseAdded)
member.summary: Called when a team answers (part of) a quiz item.

member.name: M:Pubquiz.WebApi.Hubs.IGameHub.AnswerScored(Pubquiz.Logic.Messages.AnswerScored)
member.summary: Called when the system has scored (part of) an answer.

member.name: M:Pubquiz.WebApi.Hubs.IGameHub.GameSelected(Pubquiz.Logic.Messages.GameSelected)
